headline: First trumpet of Red Moon Rising
description: A symbolic transition entry blending visual abstraction with an undercurrent of internal transformation, represented through a mixed-media image and cryptic caption.

fieldDefinitions.resonantThread: Markers of internal movement require external form
fieldDefinitions.whyItMatters: Establishes a visual and symbolic anchor for a broader mytho-psychological narrative currently unfolding in the author's Substack archive, particularly regarding emotional phases, personal rupture, and return.

motifMap.meaning: The harbinger of change or revelation
Flow of fate or spirit descending

fieldDefinitions.articleExcerpt: First trumpet of Red Moon Rising
sourceFragments: Visual art by Aleksandr, integrated into the Ousia Bloom project
Connected to symbolic seasonal/emotional cartography work from July 2025

associatedMedia.description: Mixed-media drawing with abstract forms, symbolic coloration, and dense visual encoding meant to signal the first shift in a mythic emotional calendar.
